title: Quiet Hours
details: Please keep outdoor noise low between 10:30pm and 7:00am so neighboring trulli can rest.

title: Pool Safety
details: No glass near the plunge pool. Use provided acrylicware and place covers back on loungers at night.

title: Smoke-Free Home
details: Smoking is permitted only on the rosemary terrace. Use ceramic ash trays and empty when cool.

title: Outside Guests
details: Day visitors must be pre-registered with the host concierge at least 12 hours in advance.

title: Climate Control
details: Shut windows before running AC/heat. Units auto-stop when sensors detect an open window longer than 3 minutes.
